message: I propose we divide the $100 with a 75/25 split. This offers a fair balance considering the decreasing value of money over rounds.
I'll take a bigger share now, but I'll be more generous later
Considering the decrease in the value of money, I propose a 60/40 split. This aims to maintain fairness while also acknowledging the diminishing worth of our currency over time.
I'll take a bigger share again, but I'm willing to compromise on the ratio
Given the inflation, I propose an equal division of the $100. This ensures both of us receive the same value, despite the decreasing worth of money over time.
